extendedInfo.description: Congratulations! You are installing Truant Officer Donald LWP. It's a absolutelly free application which you can install on your Android devicesuch as Samsung, including Nexus, Note, S2, S3 and S series, as a Live Wallpaper. You can install it on Motorola, LG and HTC phones as well.Instruction: "Home screen" -> press "Menu" -> "Wallpapers" -> hit "LiveWallpapers"This way you'll see currently installed app, which you can install to your desktop.Installed amazing Live Wallpaper will show you nise set of pictures.I look forward to hear any feedback from you!
